$WmMPID_水着オグマ,ch01_01_Oguma_M_Swim21,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_水着フロージ,ch00_26_Froda_M_Swim21,Face|Ah... So then, you are Ogma... I had
not expected to find you alone...$k$p$WmMPID_水着オグマ,ch01_01_Oguma_M_Swim21,Face|King Freyr... As a bodyguard, if I
stay too close, I will get in the way
of Princess Caeda's enjoyment.$k$pShe is off shopping for now. I do not
see any danger in that...$k$p$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Did you see that girl a minute ago?
I've never seen a girl that beautiful
before in my life!$k$p$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|I want to see! Let's go back and
find her. Maybe she's looking to
have some fun... Haha!$k$p$WmMPID_水着オグマ,ch01_01_Oguma_M_Swim21,Face|Gah!$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_水着オグマ,ch01_01_Oguma_M_Swim21,Face|I must be off to locate Princess
Caeda—and quickly.$k$p$WmMPID_水着フロージ,ch00_26_Froda_M_Swim21,Face|In that case, please allow me to
accompany you...$k$p$Sbs150|
